home.Cancellation.message: Unfortunatelly, the borders are currently closed due to COVID-19. You won't be able to attend Osheaga this year.
home.Cancellation.solution.title: But don't worry, we've got your music fix covered:
home.redirection.message: Click here to start your journey to Coachella
coachella.title: You are almost there!
coachella.description: Coachella is just 11 days away! Book your ticket now to be part of one of the biggest musical event in the world!
